ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Looking at historiography of Tokugawa Japan is worthwhile for anyone interested in early modern history, Japan, or Asia. Amazing readings and discussions
An in-depth examination of Tokugawa and Meiji Japanese history (focusing on Tokugawa), exploring various angles from which one may examine not only the topic but historic analyses in general.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course was not only informative in its historical content but revealed new ways of thinking of Tokugawa history and beyond. A few topics especially stood out as new critical frameworks to which I had not been exposed, and will certainly inform my research going forward.
